title: Wallet Doxxer Input
description: Search Twitter/X for wallet addresses and find their owners

walletText.title: Wallet addresses
walletText.description: Paste wallet addresses here - one per line, or CSV format with 'wallet_address' column. This is the easiest way to input wallets.

walletAddresses.title: Wallet addresses (JSON)
walletAddresses.description: Alternative: provide wallet addresses as a JSON array. Useful for programmatic API calls.

inputFile.title: Input file URL
inputFile.description: Alternative: URL to a CSV, JSON, or text file containing wallet addresses. Best for large datasets (10k+ wallets).

batchLimit.title: Batch limit
batchLimit.description: Maximum wallets to process per run. Set to 5000 for large datasets to avoid timeouts. Set to 0 for no limit.
batchLimit.sectionDescription: Configure batch processing and checkpoint behavior for large datasets

resumeFromCheckpoint.title: Resume from checkpoint
resumeFromCheckpoint.description: Continue from where the last run stopped. Enable this for large datasets that span multiple runs.

clearCheckpoint.title: Clear previous checkpoint
clearCheckpoint.description: Start fresh by clearing any saved progress. Use this if you're starting a new dataset.
